A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
To true STAR WARS lovers\, this movie is RICH. 
DELICIOUS! 
It's always been about the story...the mythology. Yes\, the film making and special effects are always state of the art and flawless.
But those of us who know and follow the story could care less about that. 

THE LAST JEDI opens the continuing saga up  much in the same as Episode V...The Empire Strikes Back. 
It Literally sells a half a Billion dollars worth of tickets for Episode IX. 

GREAT MOVIE.
